title: Midnight Noir Tailored Shirt Dress
image_prompt: Flat-lay product render of a black tailored shirt dress, isolated on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, matte black buttons, waist tie belt, crisp collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, knee-length hem, no model or mannequin, apparel-only view.
style_fit: regular fit with adjustable waist tie
techpack: Black cotton-poly poplin shirt dress with tailored A-line silhouette, classic shirt collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, matte black buttons down front placket, self-fabric waist tie belt, knee-length hem, double-stitched seams for durability.
provenance: Inspired by the commercial trend of black colorways for versatile day-to-night wear.
design_text:
Midnight Noir Tailored Shirt Dress (BLK001)
Colors: midnight black, charcoal grey accents
Fabrics: cotton poplin, polyester blend
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: shirt dress
Silhouette: tailored A-line
Sleeves: long sleeves with buttoned cuffs
Neckline: classic shirt collar
Length: knee-length
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t,  , w, i, t, h,  , a, d, j, u, s, t, a, b, l, e,  , w, a, i, s, t,  , t, i, e
Trims & details: matte black buttons, self-fabric waist tie belt, double-stitched seams
